column1: EVTDESCmoduscarolimagni.0002;The time has come to name the Seven Prince Electors of the Holy Roman Empire. We have several options
column2: though none will appease all of our vassals. It is said that of old
column3: the Tribal Dukes of the Saxons
column7: along with the Archbishops of Mainz
column9: and Trier elected the emperor from amongst the realm's nobles. Which vassals shall we elevate?;
